name: @unegma/react-three-fpscontrols
description: React Three Fiber FPS Controls for mobile and desktop

scripts.pub-major: npm run build && npm version major --force && npm publish --access public && git push --tags
scripts.pub-minor: npm run build && npm version minor --force && npm publish --access public && git push --tags
scripts.pub-patch: npm run build && npm version patch --force && npm publish --access public && git push --tags
